thread.title: How Luis Enrique's face have aged over the last 3 seasons
thread.title_full: How Luis Enrique's face have aged over the last 3 seasons

title: How Luis Enrique's face have aged over the last 3 seasons
text:
Barcelona Coach leaving the Blaugrana citing tiredness The changing face of Luis Enrique Shared Updated 02/03/2017 13:01 CET 
I t is now confirmed that Luis Enrique will be heading out the Camp Nou exit door in the summer with the Barcelona coach claiming he is fed up and tired of the role . 
Undoubtedly one of the most pressurised jobs in football, the Asturian has overseen great success but at a mental, and apparently physical, personal cost. 
Use the slider above to compare the fresh-faced former midfielder who joined the club three years ago, and the 46-year-old as he is now. BEST OF MARCA
